title: 【跑酷】INFINITY|无限跑酷|玩不完的跑酷|随机生成跑酷|DOMINICTHESTAR
author: Xiao_Tao_Zi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 像素君 于 2017-8-12 23:06 编辑 

简介 DescriptionThis is a parkour map! But not just an ordinary one! no... this one is endless! it just keeps on generating! That means ENDLESS rage, fun, parkouring, more rage and even more rage! good luck!A few things about the map:The map is NOT multiplayer compatible.The map can lagg when generating a new course.The map uses a resource pack, which is included, or can be downloaded by following the link in the map.
Good luck while trying to get past level 100!!!
这是一个跑酷地图！但不是一个普通的！这是一个无限的！这就一直生成！这会很好玩。会越来越疯狂！-此地图不支持多人-生成时可能会卡-此地图使用材质包！包含在地图包里。祝你好运，祝你能过100关！
作者：DOMINICTHESTAR
版本：1.11.2





图片 picture
